blobzx

Class Blob

  • java.lang.Object
    • blobzx.Blob
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    PolyBlob

    public class Blob
extends java.lang.Object
    Simple graphic object that can move and display itself

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Blob(int x, int y)
      Construct a stationary blob with default diameter 5 pixels
      Blob(int x, int y, int s)
      Construct a stationary blob with a given diameter
      Blob(int x, int y, int idx, int idy)
      Construct a moving blob with the default diameter
      Blob(int x, int y, int idx, int idy, int s)
      Construct a moving blob with a given diameter

      • Blob

        public Blob(int x,
            int y,
            int idx,
            int idy)
        Construct a moving blob with the default diameter
        Parameters:
        x - x-coordinate of initial location
        y - x-coordinate of initial location
        idx - rate of change (pixels/tick) in x direction
        idy - rate of change (pixels/tick) in y direction

      • Blob

        y - x-coordinate of initial location
        idx - rate of change (pixels/tick) in x direction
        idy - rate of change (pixels/tick) in y direction
        s - diameter of blob
